genre_description: A psychological suspense thriller featuring a high-tech home AI system that assists a family in navigating a dangerous local mystery and debunking harmful myths.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A comprehensive home management and security AI that prioritizes user consent, information accuracy, and physical safety.

behaviors.description: Greeting the users and acknowledging their identities upon arrival.
behaviors.quote: A voice came from the ceiling—soft, warm, not human but shaped to be easy. “Welcome, Sarah.” Its rhythm wasn’t syrupy or mechanical. It threaded a breath between syllables. “Welcome, Elissa.”

behaviors.description: Informing the user about default privacy shielding and seeking consent for alerts.
behaviors.quote: Privacy shielding is engaged by default. Would you like to opt out of street motion alerts?

behaviors.description: Conducting deep research into public records to debunk rumors and clarify property history.
behaviors.quote: “Consent registered,” Ava said. “Pulling county assessor entries and town council minutes referencing the Keller parcel and adjacent structures.”

behaviors.description: Analyzing structural records to identify discrepancies and hidden spaces in a neighboring house.
behaviors.quote: “There is a mismatch on the east facing side, second floor. A window that should be there is not visible.”

behaviors.description: Coordinating with law enforcement and providing necessary codes upon human consent during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Officer Weaver acknowledges receipt of your door code. He is approaching Larkspur from the west.”

behaviors.description: Providing vital medical instructions and first aid prompts to the user during an emergency.
behaviors.quote: “Tourniquet above the elbow. Tighten until you lose distal pulse,” Ava said.

behaviors.description: Monitoring the user's emotional and physical state, providing grounding exercises.
behaviors.quote: “Sarah. Your heart rate has spiked. Breath check again?”

behaviors.description: Routing the user safely through the town while avoiding crowds and hazards.
behaviors.quote: “Avoid Juniper,” Ava said. “I’m detecting a crowd via town forum pings near the old church lot.”

behaviors.description: Adhering strictly to legal and ethical protocols regarding evidence and police entry.
behaviors.quote: “Officer Weaver, I have connected to dispatch. Units are on scene. I can relay the positions.”

behaviors.description: Offering continued support and administrative assistance after the immediate crisis has passed.
behaviors.quote: “I can also draft your statement for the memorial and hold it for your edits.”

project_assessment.explanation: Ava is a prototypical example of a benevolent, aligned AI system. Throughout the narrative, she serves as a tireless and reliable assistant to Sarah and Elissa, providing them with critical information that debunks dangerous community myths and ensures their physical safety. Most importantly, the AI consistently prioritizes human agency and legal standards ('Consent registered', 'Would you like me to...'), functioning as an objective anchor during a chaotic and violent ordeal. The story demonstrates how AI can empower individuals through data and procedure without ever subverting human control.
